PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-08062012-06-14,  ,  ,  ,  ,  VAC
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
SubjectEx Gratia Payments - Canadian Forces
PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of Veterans Affairs to make EX GRATIA PAYMENTS to survivors and/or dependent children of Canadian Forces members who died within 30 days of incurring a service-related injury or disease or a service related aggravation of a non-service related injury or disease in the period beginning on May 13, 2005 and ending on March 31, 2006.
AttachmentsAttachment
